event.title: An introduction to backbone.js
event.description:
jQuery is great, isn't it?

Up to a point. Google Web Toolkit may not have been the silver bullet but your sites will and are behaving more like native apps.

jQuery and friends don't offer any real structure out of the box, so we have a new breed of MV* type frameworks to fill the gap.

Welcome backbone.js and Rick Hurst of Potato.

 

Swiftly followed by a lightning talk on Weinre by SimpleWeb's very own Adam Butler.

 

<< Call for dev tips and JS showcase >>
